title: Piyawong's Digital Portfolio
description: An elegant personal portfolio showcasing modern web development craftsmanship
longDescription: A meticulously crafted digital portfolio that represents the pinnacle of modern web development. Built with Next.js 15 for blazing-fast performance, enhanced with sophisticated animations through Framer Motion, and styled with Tailwind CSS for pixel-perfect responsive design. This platform serves as both a showcase of technical expertise and a testament to thoughtful user experience design, featuring seamless navigation, optimized performance metrics, and accessibility-first architecture.

title: KnowMe AI
description: Intelligent conversational AI that unveils personality through meaningful dialogue
longDescription: An innovative AI-powered conversational experience designed to create authentic connections through intelligent dialogue. Leveraging advanced language models from OpenAI and sophisticated prompt engineering via LangChain, this application transforms traditional introductions into engaging, personalized conversations. Built on a robust Next.js foundation with TypeScript for type safety, the platform features dynamic interactions, contextual memory, and adaptive responses that evolve with each conversation, creating a unique window into personality and professional expertise.
